long_desc.thetext:
---------------------------------------- In B.2.3.2 "String.prototype.anchor ( name )":
{1} B.2.3.2 / CreateHTML / step 5.a: Let /V/ ToString(/value/). After "V", insert "be"
{2} B.2.3.2 / CreateHTML / step 5.d / item 3: attribute= These should be two separate items. "attribute" is in monospace, should be italic serif.
{3} B.2.3.2 / CreateHTML / step 8: Let /p4/ be the string value that is the concatenation of /p2/, "</", ... Change "p2" to "p3"
---------------------------------------- In B.2.3.13 "String.prototype.sub ()":
{4} B.2.3.13 / step 2: Return CreateHTML(/S/, "sub", "", "". Insert right-paren
---------------------------------------- In B.3.2 "Web Legacy Compatibility for Block-Level Function Declarations":
{5} B.3.2 / algorithm / step 1: Let /F/ be StringValue the /BindingIdentifier/ of /FunctionDeclaration/ /f/. After "StringValue", insert "of"
{6} B.3.2 / algorithm / step 2.b.i: Let /fenv/ be the running execution context's VariableEnviornment. s|Enviornment|Environment|
{7} B.3.2 / algorithm / step 2.b.ii: Let /benv/ be the running execution context's LexicalEnviornment. s|Enviornment|Environment|
{8} B.3.2 / algorithm / para 4: If an ECMAScript implication has a mechanism ... s|implication|implementation|
XXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXXX
